body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Car Dealership customer service. My name is Lawrence Lee and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Lawrence, my name is Julie Hill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julie. Could you provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you promptly if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight six seven five three oh nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also confirm your address for us to update our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three Pine Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Julie. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today regarding our Car Dealership services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a question about the return policy. I'm feeling frustrated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Julie. Let me explain our return policy to address your concerns. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Is there anything else you would like to discuss?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Julie. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out to us. Have a great day!
